gift_source:
::MC1::
What does color constancy ensure?
{
= Object colors appear stable despite changes in illumination
~ All objects reflect the same spectrum
~ Shadows disappear from images
~ Only grayscale values are preserved
}
title: MC1
question: What does color constancy ensure?

choices.text: Object colors appear stable despite changes in illumination
All objects reflect the same spectrum
